Goal of this project


In this project we will build historical wheater page called 
RainyDay
. We will built this from opensource software using everyday hardware.
For that to work we need to take the following steps:




Gather the data


Transform it to an easy to handle format (JSON)


Index it


Disclose it as an API


Build a web/app to show the data/query




For this we are going to use the following software packages:




Apache NiFi (gather)


Apache HDFS (save)


Apache Spark (transform)


Apache Solr (index)


Angular (visualize)




Please Read and do in the following order:
-  Cluster
-  HDFS
-  Spark
-  Nifi
